name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: According to the bulletin, Confessions are heard for half an hour before all Masses, not only at midday. On Monday there is also a 6:30 pm Mass, so Confessions are additionally from 6:00–6:30 pm. Wednesday–Friday each have a 1:05 pm Mass, so Confessions remain 12:35–1:05 pm on those days.
According to the PDF, Confessions are listed as 11:30am–12:30pm (or on request). No restriction to Mondays is stated.

According to the parish newsletter, the Sacrament of Reconciliation is available on Saturdays from 16:15 to 17:15, or by appointment. Therefore, the previously stated 16:15–16:45 window is incorrect. Please note the extended availability until 17:15. Thank you for your attention.
According to the parish newsletter, the Sacrament of Reconciliation is on Saturdays from 16:15 to 17:15, not 16:15 to 16:45. Confessions are also available by appointment.
